components.name: TiAPI
components.description: This component is used for cross-platform API work. Specifications are most likely to use this component.

fields.description:
It'd be useful to create equivalents of some of the core Node modules in Titanium so that users could port/re-use node codebases on mobile devices. Some of the more common modules could map relatively easily to devices, and would be worth investigating.

http://nodejs.org/api/path.html
fields.summary: TiAPI: Create Node-compatible path module API

Verified the fix in SDK 8.0.0.v20190123061938.

Closing.
